price: Ubutagatifu ni ubw’uwaremye ibitsina byombi (ikigabo n’ikigore); byaba mu bimera mu butaka byose, muri bo ubwabo (abantu) ndetse no mu byo batazi.
arabic: سُبۡحَٰنَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلۡأَزۡوَٰجَ كُلَّهَا مِمَّا تُنۢبِتُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَمِنۡ أَنفُسِهِمۡ وَمِمَّا لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: sub'ḥāna alladhī khalaqa al-azwāja kullahā mimmā tunbitu al-arḍu wamin anfusihim wamimmā lā yaʿlamūna
